summary: The module provides a command‑line script that fine‑tunes the Stable Diffusion XL text‑to‑image model using Low‑Rank Adaptation (LoRA). It parses training options, loads and preprocesses a dataset, prepares the diffusion model and tokenizer, runs a distributed training loop with Accelerate, performs periodic validation, logs metrics, and saves checkpoints and a model card, optionally pushing the result to the Hugging Face hub.
business_intent: Allow developers and researchers to efficiently adapt a large pre‑trained text‑to‑image diffusion model to specific visual domains or custom data while minimizing computational cost, enabling customized image generation services or products.
